recipe_name: Chocolate Banana Peanut Butter Protein Shake
ingredients: 6  ice cubes, 1 cup milk, 1  banana, 1 scoop chocolate-flavored protein powder, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, 1 tablespoon honey, 1 teaspoon unsweetened cocoa powder, or more to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 23g 29%, Saturated Fat 7g 37%, Cholesterol 60mg 20%, Sodium 341mg 15%, Total Carbohydrate 67g 24%, Dietary Fiber 6g 22%, Total Sugars 46g, Protein 31g, Vitamin C 11mg 55%, Calcium 313mg 24%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 1041mg 22%
